subject: Delegation of powers for approval of bids for awrd of works under EPC/ item rate mode;OMT projects and collection of user fee.
text: HRai4 7rh TTTHrf wfearut Tyi9 Phone 91-11-25074100/25074200 (84 qart ar Tronrf TATTT4) F4R Fax ` 91-11-25093507 25093514 National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Road Transport and Highways) 7-5 Q 6, Wer-10 , ERAT, # fari-110075 6-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka_ New Delhi-110075 No. 11041/218/2007-Admn Dated: 27.05.2015 Policy Matters: Technical (178/2015) (Decision_taken_in_the_104th Meeting ofthe Authority_held on 15.05.2015vide Agenda Item No104.08) Sub:: Delegation of powers for approval of bids for award of works under EPC/ltem rate mode, OMT projects and collection of user fee: Para i) (a) of the Policy Matters-Technical Circular No. 131/2013 dated gth April, 2013 is amended as under: ii) OMT Projects (a) The bids for award of work under OMT projects will be approved by the Chairman, NHAI, if the response to the bid is adequate 2 or more valid bids) and the quoted first year concession fee is up to 7.5 % less than the first year concession fee as at the time of SFC approval ' 2 This issues with the approval of the Competent Authority: 27 (V.K Sharma) Chief General Manager (Coord:) To All officers and employees of HQ/ROs/PIUs/CMUs/Site Offices GTMM NHALL
